DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to explore the distribution of antibiotics in the brain after an acute brain injury because brain infections treatment is still an health care problem.
DOC.brief_title: Cerebral Antibiotics Distribution After Acute Brain Injury
DOC.criteria: Acute brain injury Patient who receive an antibiotic for an infection or prophylaxy Glasgow coma score < 8 Age < 18 years old Pregnant woman HCV, HIV, HBV infection
